issue.title: [C++] Implement dictionary-encoded array container
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-427](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-427). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This will compose an array of dictionary indices (int32 type currently per the format doc) and a dictionary array
